name: GrandPrixOfNothing
description:
Grand Prix of Nothing is a Die and Retry car game where you control a little kart and unlock controls one by one. Basically you start with no controls and you have to unlock them one by one. You should end the race with full controls if you are good enough ;)

The project had to be restarted because of human ressources :) We really started it saturday at 5pm
